metadata.name: goto_label_swf_3
metadata.description: Comprehensive tests for GOTO_LABEL opcode (0x8C) - Tests label parsing with various label types: basic, underscores/numbers, mixed case, empty, single char, long, and special characters. Actual frame navigation not implemented.
missing_features: FrameLabel tag parsing and storage (tag type 43)
Frame structure does not have label field
Frame lookup by label functionality not implemented
Frame action execution on arrival not implemented
Current implementation only logs the label string
